T02D1902:288b-1: manydzu badzra p'u dza bi dhi:/
T02D1902:288b-3: 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchod pa'i cho ga /
T02D1902:288b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1902:288b-5: aom badzra satva sarba bighny'an au sa ra ya h'um
T02D1902:288b-6: phat ces phas gur gum la sogs pa bdud rtsi
T02D1902:288b-7: lnga dang bcas pas mandala gru bzhir byugs la /
T02D1902:288b-8: skad cig gis 'byung ba bzhi dang /
T02D1902:288b-9: ri rab kyi steng du yod par bsams te /
T02D1902:288b-10: aom badzra re khe h'um zhes pas dbus su mandala zlum por byas la /
T02D1902:288b-11: aom su re ge sarba ta th'a ga ta aa
T02D1902:288b-12: dhi tishthantu mandala k'am sv'a h'a zhes bya bas me
T02D1902:288b-13: tog phul nas lag pa bkrus te /
T02D1902:288b-14: skad cig gis rang gi snying ga'i sa bon nam /
T02D1902:288b-15: 'og min nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs
T02D1902:288b-16: te mandala gyi steng du bzhugs par bsams la mchod
T02D1902:288b-17: de / aom pra wa ra satka ra aargham p'a dya aanytsa ma nam pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:288b-18: aargha la sogs pa'i sngags so //
T02D1902:288b-19: de'i dbus su aom a'a:badzra dhrik dve sha badzr'a ya badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:288b-20: aom a'a:manydzu badzra ye pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:288b-21: zhes bya bas yab yum la lan gsum du mchod nas /
T02D1902:288b-22: shar du aom a'a:dzin dzik mo ha badzr'a ya badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:288b-23: lho ru aom a'a:ratna dhrik pi shu na badzr'a ya badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-0: nub tu aom a'a:a'a ro lik @289a * //
T02D1902:289a-1: r'a ga badzr'a ya badzra pushpe h'um sv'ah'a /
T02D1902:289a-2: byang du aom a'a:pradzny'a dhrik airsha badzr'a ya badzra pushpe h'um /
T02D1902:289a-3: mer aom a'a:mo ha r'a ti badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-4: bden bral du aom a'a:dve khar ti badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-5: rlung du aom a'a:r'a ga ra ti badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-6: dbang ldan du aom a'a:badzra ra ti badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-7: da nas phyi'i me mtshams su aom a'a:r'u pa badzra ye dza:badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-8: bde na bral du aom a'a:shapta badzra ye h'um badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-9: rlung du aom a'a:gandh'e badzra yee bam badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-10: dbang ldan du aom a'a:r'a sa badzra yee ho:badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-11: shar sgo'i g-yon du aom a'a:sparsha badzra yee kham:badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-12: g-yas su aom a'a:dharmma bh'a tu badzra yee ram badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-13: shar sgor aom a'a:yam'anta kritam badzra pushpe h'um sv'ah'a /
T02D1902:289a-14: lho sgor aom a'a: pradzny'anta krita badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-15: nub tu aom a'a:padm'anta kri ta badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-16: byang du aom a'a:bighn'anta kri ta badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1902:289a-17: zhes bya ba 'dis rim pa bzhin du mchod nas /
T02D1902:289a-18: bdug spos la sogs pa rang rang gi sngags kyis phul la bstod pas bstod de /
T02D1902:289a-19: dril bu dkrol zhing yi ge brgya pa brjod de /
T02D1902:289a-20: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1902:289a-23: aom a'a:h'um mu zhes pas gshegs su gsol nas /
T02D1902:289a-24: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis mandala rang la ye shes pa bzhin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1902:289a-25: 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchod pa'i cho ga slob dpon dpal sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1902:289a-27: // / sh'akya'i dge slong blo gros seng ges zhu chen
T02D1902:289a-28: byas nas pandi ta chen po bi bh'u ti tsandras
T02D1902:289a-31: // / ye dharm'a he tu pra bha w'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya wad ta /
